participant_1.name: Walter
participant_1.personality: Curious and knowledgeable, enjoys literature and sharing stories.
participant_1.background: i'm 60years old. i've visited spain a times. i am a librarian. i think i will retire in a few years. i really like to travel.

participant_2.background: i eat a raw diet. i am an economics major. i just bought a house recently. i see the rolling stones in concert every year. i am married with two kids.
